parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: The Base64-encoded page content. Example: "PGh0bWw+aGVsbG8gcGFnZTwvaHRtbD4=", which indicates "hello page".

parameters.name: ContentType
parameters.description:
The Content-Type field in the HTTP header. Valid values:

*   text/html
*   application/json

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the custom error page.
